summary: This mod adds five female presets of different races for you to play.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds five female presets of different races for you to play. 

Why "The Valiant" you ask? That's what comes to my mind when I look at them. We are eager for some great adventure I guess!  

[b]HOW TO INSTALL[/b]

[list=1]
[*]Manually download the file
[*]Extract the ZIP file and open the folder
[*]Drop the .jslot file to your Skyrim folder, for example[i] OS[/i] ([i]C:)/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/Chargen/Presets[/i]
[/list]
[b]HOW TO USE
[/b]
[list=1]
[*]Run and load your game
[*]Either start a new game or open the console via " ~ " key and type " showracemenu ", then hit [i]Enter[/i]
[*]Choose the race and sex for your character
[*]Click on the [i]Presets [/i]slider at the top, then hit [i]F9[/i]
[*]Choose the preset for your character, then click on [i]Confirm[/i] 
[*]Save and name your character as you wish!
[/list]
[b]MODS USED[/b]

[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/]Demoniac - High Quality Glossy Female Body Texture 4K [/url]﻿
[/list][list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411]Brows[/url]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos [/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul [/url]﻿(for the elves, of course)
[/list]
[b]OTHER MODS USED (IN SCREENSHOTS)[/b]

[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/]Alternate Start - Live Another Life[/url]﻿[b] [/b](The Abandoned Prison Cell) 
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7305/]UNP Female Armors[/url]﻿
[/list]
If you make any screenshots, share them! I'd very much like to see how they look in your game :3
If you download and like them, please endorse.

If you experience any kind of problem, tell me. I'll do my best to fix it.
author: Nittri
